title: 3D Figurine Orthographic Views with Midjourney and GPT-4o-image API
author: PiAPI
readme:
### What this workflow does?

This workflow primarily uses the GPT-4o API from [**PiAPI**](https://piapi.ai) and automatically creates front/side/top views of 3D models from commands.

### Who is this for？

  * 3D Designers： Quickly generate standardized orthographic views for design review
  * E-commerce Operators： Create multi-angle product display images
  * 3D Modeling Beginners： Instantly produce basic reference views



### Step-by-step Instruction

  1. Fill in X-API-Key of your PiAPI account and the image prompt based on your inspiration.
  2. Click Test workflow.
  3. Get the image url in the final node.



### OutPut

![image](https://i.ibb.co/N2yFjbt6/4531745227220-pic.jpg)  
![image](https://i.ibb.co/GQKb7Nbd/s-F0h-OV19vezttez0yf-DXd-PRro-Ko8-Fj.png)

readme_zh:
### 该工作流的功能是什么？

本工作流主要调用[**PiAPI**](https://piapi.ai)的GPT-4o接口，通过指令自动生成3D模型的正视/侧视/俯视图。

### 适用人群

  * 三维设计师：快速生成标准三视图用于设计评审  
  * 电商运营人员：制作多角度产品展示图  
  * 建模初学者：即时生成基础参考视图  

### 操作指南

  1. 填写您的PiAPI账户X-API-Key及创意图像提示词  
  2. 点击测试工作流  
  3. 在最终节点获取图片链接  

### 效果展示

![三视图示例](https://i.ibb.co/N2yFjbt6/4531745227220-pic.jpg)  
![多角度展示](https://i.ibb.co/GQKb7Nbd/s-F0h-OV19vezttez0yf-DXd-PRro-Ko8-Fj.png)
title_zh: 3D手办正交视图：结合Midjourney与GPT-4o图像API实现
